samples.question: And do you like your job?
samples.transcript: Yes, I do like my job so much because, I can use English. I have lots of study abroad experience and I really enjoyed learning English since I was young. And I can use my, English ability and I enjoy meeting new people. also, I just enjoy using English itself. And plus I also enjoy speaking and writing English. So I am currently enjoying my job. Great.
samples.transcript_original: Yes, I do like my job so much because, uh, I can use English. Uh, I have lots of study abroad experience and I really enjoyed learning English since I was young. So I'm currently enjoying my job. Great.

samples.question: And what are your hobbies?

I guess, and I also like listening to music. Yeah. So I guess my favorite hobbies are, soccer and I guess music.

samples.question: And are there any hobbies you would like to take up in the future?
samples.transcript: In the future, actually I am not sure, but I would like to try new sports maybe in the future. But for some reasons I have, I almost never had a chance to play baseball. So in the future if I have a chance I would like to try to play baseball. Yes.

samples.question: So what is your favorite number?

samples.question: So yeah, could you describe a person who you regularly follow on social media?
samples.transcript: I follow, Hung Min Son, who is a famous Korean footballer on social media. As he, as I said before, he is a football player, professional football player. he is not only famous in Korea, he is pretty famous worldwide. He plays for such a popular team, Tottenham Hotspur, the most famous player. The most popular league, Premier League. Of course, well, he is very famous and actually, I have liked him for a long time actually. since he played for Hamburg in Germany. He used to play for Bundesliga. he started his career there. well, he usually, I think he usually post his moments of playing football in his league. like not only his league, Champions League or FA League. I follow him on social media because of course I like him as a footballer. I like his play and I like his attitude. But not only that, I also like him as a person. I like his character.

samples.question: So, do you think it is easy to make friends on social media?
samples.transcript: Actually I do not think so, because social media is an online platform. in my opinion, without offline meeting, I think it is really extremely difficult to become friends. So, of course, you can easily chat with new people and probably you can approach others very easily because, you can, basically send a message directly to people. Through the function But I don think it easy because in order to become friends you need to meet You need to have an offline meeting So I think it really difficult to make friends through or by social media And why is it necessary to meet people face to face to become friends because without meeting face to face, I think I would feel very awkward, just chatting online. I do not feel like I am talking to my friends. I am just, because, if I just talk to the person, Like online, I think it is kind of meaningless to me. I do not feel like I am talking to the person.
samples.transcript_original: Um, actually I don't think so, uh, because social media is an online platform. samples.question: And do you think in the future people will still read newspapers and paper books?
samples.transcript: No, I do not think so. I think everything will be turned into e-books. And I think in the future, probably every paper stuff will go away. that is my expectation. Yes, yes.

samples.question: And why do some people still prefer to use paper books?

And if they feel uncomfortable about it, I think they could just prefer to read papers instead of looking things at through the monitor or using electric stuff. Yes, yes.

Like this is a very good phone, but it has some limitations, you know, with camera or whatever. yep. Just when you talk about age groups, you said like just 20s and 30s. Make sure you say like people like in their, so people in their 20s and people in their 30s. Yeah. that was good. one thing I noticed a couple of times as well was the using a double subject. So you are saying most younger people, they watch YouTube. So we should obviously drop the, yeah, most younger people watch YouTube. Most older people like to do that. But yeah, it was really good test, really fluent and clear answers. So thank you for your time. Thank you. Cheers. Yes.
